main_topic.author: Afordancja
main_topic.title: keyword list
main_topic.content: Do I understand correctly that after July 7, the keywords.py file will be replaced with another one, but agents will have access to all new available words and categories?

comments.author: Chris Deotte
comments.content:
Where do you see the date July 7th?

August 13, 2024 - Final Submission Deadline.

  August 13, 2024- August 27, 2024 - Estimated range when final games are played.

  August 28, 2024 - Winners announced.

It is the case that the keyword list will change on August 13th. Afterward, our bots will not have access to the list.
comments.date: Posted 2 months ago  ·  637th in this Competition

reply.author: AfordancjaTopic Author
reply.content:
Where do you see the date July 7th?

ahh sorry, I copy date from "Merger & Entry"

Afterward, our bots will not have access to the list.

hm…ok, so for what is the keyword list at the moment? with categories etc.

reply.author: Chris Deotte
reply.content: Current list is keyword.py on data page here: [https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/llm-20-questions/data](https://www.kaggle.com/competitions/llm-20-questions/data)

reply.author: JavaZero
reply.content: Does this mean that there is no way to fine-tune it to get a higher score? I'm currently using just prompt engineering to solve the problem. I'm considering the feasibility of fine-tune. For example, extracting quality dialogue from lb.
